import React, { useState,createContext, useEffect } from 'react' import DropDown from '../Assests/images/DropDown.svg'; import Inputarea from './Inputarea' import Plus from '../Assests/images/Plus.svg' import userContext from './UserContext'; import Minus from '../Assests/images/minus.png'; import WeeklyUpdate from './WeeklyForm/WeeklyUpdate'; export const Resource=createContext(); const CommonDropDown = () => { const [designer, setDesigner] = useState(0); const [frontEnd, setFrontEnd] = useState(0); const [backEnd, setBackEnd] = useState(0); const [qa, setQA] = useState(0); const [total, setTotal] = useState(0); const [perform, setPerform] = useState(false); const final={ Total:total, Designer:designer, FrontEnd:frontEnd, BackEnd:backEnd, QA:qa } useEffect(()=>{ }) return (
{/* {console.log(value)} */}
{total} setPerform(!perform)} />
{(perform)?(
Designer
{ setDesigner(designer + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {designer} { setDesigner(designer - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
Front End Developer
{ setFrontEnd(frontEnd + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {frontEnd} { setFrontEnd(frontEnd - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
Back End Developer
{ setBackEnd(backEnd + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {backEnd} { setBackEnd(backEnd - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
QA
{ setQA(qa + 1); setTotal(total + 1) }} src={Plus} /> {qa} { setQA(qa - 1); setTotal(total - 1) }} src={Minus} />
):"" }
) } export default CommonDropDown
